extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    FREN353 and (FREN373 or FREN215) and Level 4 and registration in a FREN or FRLG Plan.

basic.description: This course will survey the internal development of the French language from its Latin origins to the present. Topics discussed include: selected aspects of the phonological, morphological, syntactic and lexical development as well as the evolution of the spelling system and on-going changes in French. Students will be introduced to corpus-based historical linguistics.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Histoire interne du français
